LanguageData.HeavyPowerConduit.label: 加固电缆
LanguageData.HeavyPowerConduit.description: A set of heavy electrical cables for moving power around. They are very strong and non-flammable.
LanguageData.HeavyPowerConduit_Blueprint.label: 加固电缆 (蓝图)
LanguageData.HeavyPowerConduit_Frame.label: 加固电缆 (建造中)
LanguageData.HeavyPowerConduit_Frame.description: A set of heavy electrical cables for moving power around. They are very strong and non-flammable.
LanguageData.PowerConduitInvisible.label: 隐藏电缆
LanguageData.PowerConduitInvisible.description: A set of electrical cables for moving power around. This one is hidden in the ground.
LanguageData.PowerConduitInvisible_Blueprint.label: 隐藏电缆 (蓝图)
LanguageData.PowerConduitInvisible_Frame.label: 隐藏电缆 (建造中)
LanguageData.PowerConduitInvisible_Frame.description: A set of electrical cables for moving power around. This one is hidden in the ground.
LanguageData.PowerSwitchFlicker.label: 自动开关
LanguageData.PowerSwitchFlicker_Blueprint.label: 自动开关 (蓝图)
LanguageData.PowerSwitchFlicker_Frame.label: 自动开关 (建造中)
LanguageData.TimerSwitch.label: 定时开关
LanguageData.TimerSwitch.description: Switches power on/off based on the time of day.
LanguageData.TimerSwitch_Blueprint.label: 定时开关 (蓝图)
LanguageData.TimerSwitch_Blueprint_Install.label: 定时开关 (蓝图)
LanguageData.TimerSwitch_Frame.label: 定时开关 (建造中)
LanguageData.TimerSwitch_Frame.description: Switches power on/off based on the time of day.
LanguageData.FissionBattery.label: 裂变电池
LanguageData.FissionBattery.description: Stores electricity and recycles charge using fission processes. Slightly more efficient than standard batteries. Warning - charged batteries tend to explode when heated or wet. Holds up to 4,000 W.
LanguageData.FissionBattery_Blueprint.label: 裂变电池 (蓝图)
LanguageData.FissionBattery_Blueprint_Install.label: 裂变电池 (蓝图)
LanguageData.FissionBattery_Frame.label: 裂变电池 (建造中)
LanguageData.FissionBattery_Frame.description: Stores electricity and recycles charge using fission processes. Slightly more efficient than standard batteries. Warning - charged batteries tend to explode when heated or wet. Holds up to 4,000 W.
LanguageData.AdvancedSolarGenerator.label: 高级太阳能板
LanguageData.AdvancedSolarGenerator.description: Produces electricity from sunlight. Does not work in the dark.
LanguageData.AdvancedSolarGenerator_Blueprint.label: 高级太阳能板 (蓝图)
LanguageData.AdvancedSolarGenerator_Frame.label: 高级太阳能板 (建造中)
LanguageData.AdvancedSolarGenerator_Frame.description: Produces electricity from sunlight. Does not work in the dark.
LanguageData.AdvancedWindTurbine.label: 高级风力发电机
LanguageData.AdvancedWindTurbine.description: A wind-powered electrical generator. Requires a large clear space in front and behind for optimal air flow.
LanguageData.AdvancedWindTurbine_Blueprint.label: 高级风力发电机 (蓝图)
LanguageData.AdvancedWindTurbine_Frame.label: 高级风力发电机 (建造中)
LanguageData.AdvancedWindTurbine_Frame.description: A wind-powered electrical generator. Requires a large clear space in front and behind for optimal air flow.
LanguageData.BioGenerator.label: 生物质反应堆
LanguageData.BioGenerator.description: A 生物质反应堆 that produces electricity. Requires Biodiesel for a fuel source. Power output: 1000 W.
LanguageData.BioGenerator_Blueprint.label: 生物质反应堆 (蓝图)
LanguageData.BioGenerator_Blueprint_Install.label: 生物质反应堆 (蓝图)
LanguageData.BioGenerator_Frame.label: 生物质反应堆 (建造中)
LanguageData.BioGenerator_Frame.description: A 生物质反应堆 that produces electricity. Requires Biodiesel for a fuel source. Power output: 1000 W.
LanguageData.CoalPowerPlant.label: 燃煤电站
LanguageData.CoalPowerPlant.description: The 燃煤电站 that produces electricity by burning coal-like fuels. Can be fueled with Coal Ore or Peat. Power output: 2,000 W.
LanguageData.CoalPowerPlant_Blueprint.label: 燃煤电站 (蓝图)
LanguageData.CoalPowerPlant_Frame.label: 燃煤电站 (建造中)
LanguageData.CoalPowerPlant_Frame.description: The 燃煤电站 that produces electricity by burning coal-like fuels. Can be fueled with Coal Ore or Peat. Power output: 2,000 W.
LanguageData.FuelPowerPlant.label: 燃油电站
LanguageData.FuelPowerPlant.description: A 燃油电站 that produces electricity. Can be fueled with Fuel, Prometheum or FSX. Power output: 3,500 W.
LanguageData.FuelPowerPlant_Blueprint.label: 燃油电站 (蓝图)
LanguageData.FuelPowerPlant_Frame.label: 燃油电站 (建造中)
LanguageData.FuelPowerPlant_Frame.description: A 燃油电站 that produces electricity. Can be fueled with Fuel, Prometheum or FSX. Power output: 3,500 W.
LanguageData.ThermoelectricGenerator.label: 热电发电机
LanguageData.ThermoelectricGenerator.description: Produces electricity from differences in temperatures between two rooms. Should be placed in a wall. Example: At 1,600 C (2,912 F) difference, power output is 16,200 W at 600% efficiency.
LanguageData.ThermoelectricGenerator_Blueprint.label: 热电发电机 (蓝图)
LanguageData.ThermoelectricGenerator_Frame.label: 热电发电机 (建造中)
LanguageData.ThermoelectricGenerator_Frame.descriptio: Produces electricity from differences in temperatures between two rooms. Should be placed in a wall. Example: At 1,600 C (2,912 F) difference, power output is 16,200 W at 600% efficiency.
LanguageData.NPP.label: 核电站
LanguageData.NPP.description: A 核电站 with 24,000 W power output. Requires a hopper with Enriched Uranium as a fuel source. WARNING: In case of a nuclear meltdown, build walls around the debris to contain the radiation!
LanguageData.NPP_Blueprint.label: 核电站 (蓝图)
LanguageData.NPP_Frame.label: 核电站 (建造中)
LanguageData.NPP_Frame.description: A 核电站 with 24,000 W power output. Requires a hopper with Enriched Uranium as a fuel source. WARNING: In case of a nuclear meltdown, build walls around the debris to contain the radiation!
LanguageData.NPPD.label: 核电站碎片
LanguageData.NPPD.description: Radioactive debris of a 核电站. Build walls around it to contain the radiation!
LanguageData.GauseWindTurbine.label: 高斯风力涡轮机
LanguageData.GauseWindTurbine.description: A wind-powered gause electrical generator. Please keep all limbs and pets away from the turbine area! Power output: 2250 W at maximum wind speed.
LanguageData.GauseWindTurbine_Blueprint.label: 高斯风力涡轮机 (蓝图)
LanguageData.GauseWindTurbine_Frame.label: 高斯风力涡轮机 (建造中)
LanguageData.GauseWindTurbine_Frame.description: A wind-powered gause electrical generator. Please keep all limbs and pets away from the turbine area! Power output: 2250 W at maximum wind speed.
LanguageData.TeslaLigthningPower.label: 特斯拉闪电发生器
LanguageData.TeslaLigthningPower.description: Harness the incredible power source of lightning through the invention of Nikola Tesla, the 特斯拉闪电发生器! It needs to cool off from time to time when it gets too hot. Power output: 6,000 W.
LanguageData.TeslaLigthningPower_Blueprint.label: 特斯拉闪电发生器 (蓝图)
LanguageData.TeslaLigthningPower_Frame.label: 特斯拉闪电发生器 (建造中)
LanguageData.TeslaLigthningPower_Frame.description: Harness the incredible power source of lightning through the invention of Nikola Tesla, the 特斯拉闪电发生器! It needs to cool off from time to time when it gets too hot. Power output: 6,000 W.
LanguageData.PlasmaGeothermalPlant.label: 等离子体反应器
LanguageData.PlasmaGeothermalPlant.description: Produces tax-free electricity from a steam geyser. Must be placed on a steam geyser. A 等离子发电机 can be linked to absorb plasma discharges. Requires to be fueled by Tin or Aluminium.
LanguageData.PlasmaGeothermalPlant_Blueprint.label: 等离子体反应器 (蓝图)
LanguageData.PlasmaGeothermalPlant_Frame.label: 等离子体反应器 (建造中)
LanguageData.PlasmaGeothermalPlant_Frame.description: Produces tax-free electricity from a steam geyser. Must be placed on a steam geyser. A 等离子发电机 can be linked to absorb plasma discharges. Requires to be fueled by Tin or Aluminium.
LanguageData.PlasmaGen.label: 等离子发电机
LanguageData.PlasmaGen.description: Produces tax-free electricity through plasma discharges from a 等离子体反应器. It needs to be fully charged first.
LanguageData.PlasmaGen_Blueprint.label: 等离子发电机 (蓝图)
LanguageData.PlasmaGen_Frame.label: 等离子发电机 (建造中)
LanguageData.PlasmaGen_Frame.description: Produces tax-free electricity through plasma discharges from a 等离子体反应器. It needs to be fully charged first.
LanguageData.XenonIonTurbine.label: 氙离子涡轮机
LanguageData.XenonIonTurbine.description: Must be placed on a steam geyser. The 氙离子涡轮机 produces power from extreme heat, and efficiency can go above 100%. Example: At 250 C (482 F) power output is 5,000 W with 150% efficiency.
LanguageData.XenonIonTurbine_Blueprint.label: 氙离子涡轮机 (蓝图)
LanguageData.XenonIonTurbine_Frame.label: 氙离子涡轮机 (建造中)
LanguageData.XenonIonTurbine_Frame.description: Must be placed on a steam geyser. The 氙离子涡轮机 produces power from extreme heat, and efficiency can go above 100%. Example: At 250 C (482 F) power output is 5,000 W with 150% efficiency.
LanguageData.AntimatterReactor.label: 反物质反应堆
LanguageData.AntimatterReactor.description: The contained antimatter separates from normal matter by magnetic fields so that no unintended reactions take place. The energy would then be extracted in much the same way that nuclear reactors capture the expended heat and light energy from fission reactions. Power output: 32,000 W.
LanguageData.AntimatterReactor_Blueprint.label: 反物质反应堆 (蓝图)
LanguageData.AntimatterReactor_Frame.label: 反物质反应堆 (建造中)
LanguageData.AntimatterReactor_Frame.description: The contained antimatter separates from normal matter by magnetic fields so that no unintended reactions take place. The energy would then be extracted in much the same way that nuclear reactors capture the expended heat and light energy from fission reactions. Power output: 32,000 W.
